acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should handle integer values, both native and wrapped
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldHandleIntegerValues

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for <span class='step-parameter'>class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.annotations.IntegerValuePojo

Then the Pojo IntegerRangeValuesPojo ( intFieldWithMinValueOnly = 0 intFieldWithPreciseValue = 145241 intFieldWithMaxValueOnly = 57 intFieldWithMinAndMaxValue = 75 integerObjectFieldWithMinValueOnly = 0 integerObjectFieldWithMaxValueOnly = 14 integerObjectFieldWithMinAndMaxValue = 288 integerObjectFieldWithPreciseValue = 145241 ) should not be null
Then the integer field should be greater or equal to zero
Then the integer field 57 should have a value not greater than 100
Then the integer field 75 should have a value between 0 and 1000
Then the integer field should not be null
Then the integer field should be greater or equal to zero
Then the integer field should not be null
Then the integer field 14 should have a value not greater than 100
Then the integer field should not be null
Then the integer field 288 should have a value between 0 and 1000
Then the integer field 145241 should have the precise value of 145241
Then the integer field should not be null
Then the integer field 145241 should have the precise value of 145241
